trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class that can be implemented to verify an expected identity against an authorization context that represents a remote endpoint, or to create an identity from an endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""> </xref> classe base che può essere implementata per verificare un'identità prevista in un contesto di autorizzazione che rappresenta un endpoint remoto, o per creare un'identità da un indirizzo endpoint.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.TryGetIdentity%2A> method first to retrieve the service's identity from the message.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastruttura chiamate di <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.TryGetIdentity%2A>metodo per recuperare l'identità del servizio dal messaggio.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.TryGetIdentity%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, the infrastructure calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.CheckAccess%2A> method with the returned <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, l'infrastruttura chiama il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.CheckAccess%2A>metodo con lo restituito <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.CheckAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing the class, see [How to: Create a Custom Client Identity Verifier](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'implementazione della classe, vedere [procedura: creare un verificatore di identità Client personalizzato](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of this class.
Implements a method to verify an identity.
trans-unit.target: Implementa un metodo per verificare un'identità.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the identity is verified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'identità viene verificata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a default instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza predefinita di questa classe.

trans-unit.source: Tries to create an identity from an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di creare un'identità da un endpoint.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier> creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity> based on the hostname portion of <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Uri%2A> if an explicit <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity> has not been specified as part of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.
trans-unit.target: Il predefinito <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier>Crea un' <xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity>in base la porzione hostname di <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Uri%2A>Se <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity>non è stato specificato come parte di <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> </xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity> un' esplicita</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Uri%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> to use for creating the identity.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the identity is returned; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se viene restituito l'identità. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
